name: Doradora Island Saga: Legacy
description:
DIS:Legacy is an old-school single-play Real Time Strategy game set in a JRPG-ish fantasy world in its late antique period, the twilight of PAX IMPERIA... with Dragon girls!
DIS:Legacyは、「帝国の平和」が崩れゆく黄昏の時代のファンタジー世界を舞台とした、オールドスクールでコンパクトなシングルプレイRTSです。

5 factions with diverse play styles are available to play!
それぞれプレイスタイルの異なる５種類のファクションで遊べるぞ！

Factions/勢力概観

Dragons/竜族

Protagonist draconic faction! 
主人公勢力のドラさんたち！
 　Pros: Easiest to play!
　　お手軽で最強！
　Cons: Might be boring for experienced RTS players
　　安易

Rtpian Empire/アルティピア帝国

Definitely not Late Roman Empire with definitely not Labarum.
これじゃない後期ローマ帝国。
　Pros: Strongest Military, Sturdy Buildings, Starts from Imperial Age
　　最強の軍隊、頑丈な建物、時代進化不要
　Cons: Literally doomed economy
　　最悪の内政

Poteton Rebels/ポテチ反乱軍

JRPG-ish Goth, Celts, or Franks... whatever, something barbaric.
JRPG味の野蛮人。
　Pros: Cheap and fast unit production
　　ユニットが安い上異常な速度で出る
　Cons: Terribly weak units
　　よわい

Rurikia-Borsch Alliance/ルーリキア・ボルシチ連合

Definitely not Rus.
これじゃないルーシ。
　Pros: Stable economics, Strong Infantry
　　安定した内政と強い歩兵
　Cons: Lacking mobility, Clumsy Archer
　　機動力に欠けており射手が微妙

Sushi Horde/スシ・ウルス

A faction themed around far eastern civilizations... and Greenskins!
サムラーイ、キツネ、ゲイシャ！カミカゼ！
　Pros: High mobility. Also, their wizard units have quite unique skillset: Wololo!
　　機動力が高く、相手を転向できる魔術師ユニットがいる
　Cons: Explosive, Pure anachronism
　　爆発する、時代錯誤

Controls (temporary machine-translated) It's pretty much like AoEII.
Mouse operation:
Left click: select individual unit, button click
Left click on the mini-map: move the camera to the corresponding location/decision
Left drag: select multiple units
Right click: order move destination, attack target or work target
Right click on the minimap: order move to the corresponding location
Middle click: speed up the camera
,/Mouse4: Automatically jump to military units waiting for instructions
. /Mouse5: automatically jump to the production unit waiting for instructions.
Move the mouse cursor to the edge of the screen: Move the camera to the corresponding direction.

The most important key commands:
V: Pause (you should learn this one even if you forget everything else)
Space: Move the camera to the selected unit
Press and hold Space: Follow the camera to the selected unit
Shift+Right click: Set unit's movement path
Shift+Right click on minimap: Set movement path to corresponding location
Esc: Bring up menu, Cheat sheet available

Useful key commands:
Q/W/E/R: Quick cast the skills or produce the corresponding unit
A: Change the unit AI to aggressive stance
S: Change the unit AI to a defensive stance
D: Change the unit AI to standby stance
F: Stop unit AI and change to manual stance
X/Alt+Right Click: Attack Move
Number keys: Select the registered unit
Ctrl+numeric keys: Register the selected unit as the numbered unit
del: kill the selected units

Shortcuts etc. :
Shift+production command:Reserve 5 units for production
Ctrl+production command: Reserve 10 units for production

H:Jump to Town Center
Ctrl+b:Select Barracks
Ctrl+l:Select Stables
Ctrl+v:Select Castle
Ctrl+k:Select Siege Weaponary
Ctrl+y:Select Draconic Statue
Ctrl+m:Select Market
Ctrl+s:Select Ironsmith
Ctrl+u:Select University/Temple

Currently available to play only in Japanese. 

But hey, broken English translation coming soon! maybe... vielleicht... たぶん。
